video.title: Young Justice
video.synopsis: This animated series follows Robin, Aqualad and other teenage superhero sidekicks as they form a secret crime-fighting squad to save the world.

episodes.synopsis: In the premiere episode, Robin, Speedy, Aqualad and Kid Flash are finally granted access to the headquarters of the Justice League.
episodes.title: Independence Day

episodes.synopsis: Kid Flash, Robin and Aqualad are captured by the Cadmus genomorph forces, which prepare to clone them and dispose of the originals.
episodes.title: Fireworks

episodes.synopsis: After Speedy declines to join the new team, Dick Grayson, Kaldur'ahm and Wally West fear Young Justice is just a big joke.
episodes.title: Welcome to Happy Harbor

episodes.synopsis: On their first official assignment, the team finds itself caught in a struggle between the deadly Bane and cult leader Kobra.
episodes.title: Drop-Zone

episodes.synopsis: Superboy's anger over his non-relationship with Superman is getting out of control. He refuses to train with Black Canary and later goes rogue.
episodes.title: Schooled

episodes.synopsis: Artemis faces an uphill battle trying to win over her new teammates as she tries to fill Red Arrow's boots on a mission he initiated.
episodes.title: Infiltrator

episodes.synopsis: When the team investigates the disappearance of Kent Nelson, the scientific-minded Wally West is forced to confront his disbelief in magic.
episodes.title: Denial

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous mission with the team, Aqualad returns to Atlantis to choose between a life on the surface world or one beneath the waves.
episodes.title: Downtime

episodes.synopsis: The team finds itself wandering a desert with no memory of the last six months -- or of one another. Only Miss Martian can restore their minds.
episodes.title: Bereft

episodes.synopsis: Red Arrow's battle to prevent the League of Shadows from inciting a war pits him against the world's most dangerous assassins.
episodes.title: Targets

episodes.synopsis: Batman assigns Superboy and Miss Martian to go undercover inside Belle Reve Penitentiary, a prison designed to house the world's worst supervillains.
episodes.title: Terrors

episodes.synopsis: When the cave is attacked, can Artemis and Robin -- the two teens without superpowers -- save the team (or even themselves) from the unknown invaders?
episodes.title: Homefront

episodes.synopsis: Rattled after an invasion of the cave, the team learns that Aqualad -- their friend and leader -- withheld information that put them all at risk.
episodes.title: Alpha Male

episodes.synopsis: When plant creatures attack cities around the world, the team is eager to join the fight. Instead, Batman assigns them a still more dangerous task.
episodes.title: Revelation

episodes.synopsis: The team is on the hunt for Red Tornado, determined to find out whether the robot was the mole -- even if it means kidnapping new friend Zatanna.
episodes.title: Humanity

episodes.synopsis: During an alien invasion, the team faces the ultimate challenge when they are forced to replace the fallen Justice League.
episodes.title: Failsafe

episodes.synopsis: Conner Kent's pet, Sphere, has undergone a startling transformation, bringing it to the attention of the Forever People of New Genesis.
episodes.title: Disordered

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Artemis and Zatanna go to Manhattan for a night out, only to be hunted by Harm, a psycho in training who's hiding a deadly secret.
episodes.title: Secrets

episodes.synopsis: When every adult on the planet disappears, only the team, Zatanna and Billy Batson are left to defeat the five most powerful sorcerers on Earth.
episodes.title: Misplaced

episodes.synopsis: Wally West comes oh-so-close to fulfilling his birthday wish to fight alongside the Justice League. Instead, he's tasked with a simple delivery job.
episodes.title: Coldhearted

episodes.synopsis: A covert operation against Queen Bee in Qurac forces Miss Martian to finally face her greatest fears and her biggest secrets.
episodes.title: Image

episodes.synopsis: Superboy returns to Project Cadmus, where he learns the top-secret genetics lab may have created another Super Clone.
episodes.title: Agendas

episodes.synopsis: Red Arrow's return undercuts Artemis's confidence, while the team's mission to track down Sportsmaster threatens to expose her darkest secrets.
episodes.title: Insecurity

episodes.synopsis: The team goes undercover at the Haly International Traveling Circus to locate a thief who's been stealing weapons technology across Europe.
episodes.title: Performance

episodes.synopsis: The team gets a new member and a new mission: a mission that may finally expose all the team's secrets -- and all their lies.
episodes.title: Usual Suspects

episodes.synopsis: The team finally learns the identity of the traitor in their midst, forcing a battle against an enemy more dangerous than any they've ever faced.
episodes.title: Auld Acquaintance
